casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Antonia MILLER 2PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 15, 2017 Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Miller, Juan Antonia. John G. Batherson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Ivy Johnson, Attorney at Law, Ian Mance, Attorney at Law, for Beloved Community Center of Greensboro.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of November 2017 by Beloved Community Center of Greensboro for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

*42"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of November 2017."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
